description:
This course will focus on developing integrative skills through directed reading and analysis of the current primary literature to enable the student to develop the capstone project as the overall final exam for the specialization in systems biology.

                                            Syllabus
                        General Features of Systems Biology StudiesIssues of Reproducibility in Systems BiologyIntroduction to Research Article 2The description goes hereIntroduction to Research Article 3
title: Integrated Analysis in Systems Biology
institution_name: Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai
